pkgmetadata.longdescription: Log-Concave Density Estimation in Arbitrary Dimensions // Software for computing a log-concave (maximum likelihood) estimator for i.i.d. data in any number of dimensions. For a detailed description of the method see Cule, Samworth and Stewart (2010, Journal of Royal Statistical Society Series B, doi:10.1111/j.1467-9868.2010.00753.x).
